body:
It's possible. I checked some conservative sites and some liberal ones (namely USAToday) and they each report significantly different findings, but it's hard to get good numbers since they always rig the titles.

[Here's a piece by USAToday](https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/factcheck/2020/06/18/fact-check-more-black-people-killed-police-than-floyd-protests/5323116002/) but you'll notice they dropped the word "unarmed", when the real controversy was about that in particular. Even still though, the crowdsouced website [Mappingpoliceviolence](https://mappingpoliceviolence.org/aboutthedata) only lists 25 unarmed black deaths in the entirety of 2019, and [Wikipedia's section](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Floyd_protests#Violence_and_controversies) on the George Floyd protests puts the deaths at 26 - making even the conservative numbers correct.

My personal take after doing some digging though is OP is a bit complicit in what I blamed USAToday for - we've got unarmed, innocent deaths on one side, and just regular deaths on the other.
body_html:
It's possible. I checked some conservative sites and some liberal ones (namely USAToday) and they each report significantly different findings, but it's hard to get good numbers since they always rig the titles.

Here's a piece by USAToday but you'll notice they dropped the word "unarmed", when the real controversy was about that in particular. Even still though, the crowdsouced website Mappingpoliceviolence only lists 25 unarmed black deaths in the entirety of 2019, and Wikipedia's section on the George Floyd protests puts the deaths at 26 - making even the conservative numbers correct.

My personal take after doing some digging though is OP is a bit complicit in what I blamed USAToday for - we've got unarmed, innocent deaths on one side, and just regular deaths on the other.

post.title: More people have died as a result of the BLM riots than the number unarmed black men killed by police every year

body:
from 2015-2019 it’s roughly 230-250 black makes shot per year.

On average, 23.2 unarmed blacks are killed per year.

In 2019, less than 1% of all shootings we’re unarmed (14 people)

(https://www.washingtonpost.com/graphics/investigations/police-shootings-database/)

Now, as far as OPs claim I’m not sure what numbered he is referring to. And also i’d add that black on black shootings that happen every year is definitely not the same thing as shootings / killings caused by the riots. Not belittling the fact, but it’s an important distinction based off the claim. And using children too who have died as a result of black on black violence is misleading too.
body_html:
from 2015-2019 it’s roughly 230-250 black makes shot per year.

Upscaling to the whole population, that is about **15 million people**. Are you really saying all of these people hate whites because of the unfortunate killings of innocent people by rioters?

parent.body:
This attitude totally alienates every reasonable person and lets the media spin it as "white supremacists are acting out against the people of color". 
If we actually want to solve the problem, we need to make it very clear that it's about reasonable law-abiding people who are against criminals and aggression.
